title: Which Cigars Should I Buy Before the Price Goes Up? - The After Show
itunes:title: Which Cigars Should I Buy Before the Price Goes Up? - The After Show
description:
Today, we are talking about the cigar price increases coming in the New Year. What should you order before the prices go up?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
